author: Anonymous Comp
title: Pset 6, problem 4 clarification
question: Instructions say: "Design a function that produces the largest course number in the tree". I have two interpretations, 1: produce just the number of the course that has the highest course number, or 2: produce a course that is the highest course number. I'm unsure which is the correct interpretation.
student_answer: i think the function only produce the number not the Course
